fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Select two players. Add the first player's role number to the second player. The second player is converted into whichever role their new number becomes. Their goal and alignment will remain the same though.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - If you add someone into a number which is higher than the highest post number, you will die and lose the game. They will be unaffected by your ability in this case.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Add three people's role numbers, but don't add someone into a number higher than the highest post number.
